RelativeLayout:
<ImageView android:layout_width="322dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/searchcoloum" android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" android:layout_marginTop="30dp" android:id="@+id/imageprofile"
<ImageView android:layout_width="322dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_below="@id/imageprofile" android:layout_marginTop="-42dp" android:layout_marginLeft="350dp" android:src="@drawable/Vectoriconprofile"
